images.caption: Figure 1:Overview of the proposed method. Given the proxy action spaceùíú\mathcal{A}, the method searches for the subsetùíút\mathcal{A}_{t}that maximizes the submodular function, which consists of a utility term and a diversity term. The subsetùíút\mathcal{A}_{t}is then used for the subsequent reasoning steps.
Figure 2:A comparison of RAP andDynaActwith respect to different action space sizes (i.e.,mm). Thexx-axis indicates the number of rollouts, while theyy-axis shows the accuracy on MATH-500.
